data.event: Incorporated in 1653, Lancaster is the oldest town in Worcester County.

event.title: was first settled as "Nashaway" (after the local Nashaway Indian tribe) in 1643

data.event: Lancaster was first settled as "Nashaway" (after the local Nashaway Indian tribe) in 1643.

event.title: was officially incorporated and renamed "Lancaster on the Nashua" in 1653

data.event: It was officially incorporated and renamed "Lancaster on the Nashua" in 1653.
